reply.message: We're sorry to hear about your experience with MoneyLion Stephanie. Instacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when youâ€™re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text:
Quick and easy function of the app and good approval rate..
the only thing that made this app not get 5 stars is that it doesn't let you advance the full amount you are approved up in 1 transfer ... it only went up to $50.00 So i had to transfer 4/5 times to get the full money and each time to get it instantly charged me $4.99/5.99 so what could've been a $205/210 payback is now over $250.00 bucks.

I needed the cash quick but i don't think i'll be using unless emergency ... too many fees.
title: Too Many Fees

reply.message: We're sorry to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if youâ€™ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. Youâ€™ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.

text: I'm only giving 3 stars as of now...I called you guys and wanted to know why my instacash dropped $75 off what I used to get...I was assured by the 1st customer service rep that it would be looked into..I called on a Fri..she asked me to call back that next Wednesday...so I called Thursday just to give you more time to look into it....I called and spoke w a gentleman..gave him my confirmation number that was given by the first rep...he re assured me that I would receive a email Friday to let me know if the problem was corrected.I received no email and no one has attempted to contact me to tell me why it dropped so much...though NOTHING has changed w my deposits..amounts..etc! I count on moneyline to help thru the bad months due to covid! I guess I'll have to call again and find out what's going on!!
title: I'm only giving 3 stars as of now...Iâ€¦

text: Money Lion has been a tremendous help in this crazy time. My husband lost his job due to Covid and I have been struggling to keep things going by myself. Without Money Lion I don't think I could have done it. I make enough to pay all the bills and our necessities but I run short on gas money to get to my job. Money Lion has helped with that. It's very easy to get started and approved. The only thing I would change is the amount you can pull at once. It would make it easier.
